name: Bacon, Potato, and Egg Taco Ole
author: RHONDA35
summary: This dish can be a comforting breakfast or a fast dinner food. Onions are sauteed with potatoes and eggs then served with crispy bacon on warm flour or corn tortillas or even on buttered toast.  Add your favorite salsa or for a zesty zip!
directions: Cook over medium high heat until evenly brown
Keeping drippings in the skillet, remove the bacon and drain on paper towels
While the bacon is cooking, mix the eggs, milk, water, salt, and pepper in a bowl until combined
Add potatoes to the bacon drippings and cook until semi-soft
Pour the egg mixture into the skillet
Stir in the crumbled bacon and the butter
Cook until the eggs set to your desired firmness
Spoon mixture into tortillas and serve
